name: Game but i made it in under 2 hours
name_original: Game but i made it in under 2 hours
description: Basically i wanted to make a stupid game before i went to sleep, but ended up making a pokemon type prototype, it isnt my best work(probably is actually i was surprised as to how easy it was, but thats without any complex stuff like saving and multiple attacks and stuff it was just a simple thing) i was going to add a whole shop system but i got really tired xD so i just decided to end it at a prototype
